mapper.select: select * from cars a inner join goods b where a.user_id = #{userId} and `status` = '1' and a.good_id = b.good_id and a.good_status = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cars (car_id,user_id,good_id,good_color,good_size, good_nums , good_total_price , create_time , modify_time , good_status ) VALUES (REPLACE(UUID(),"-",""),#{userId},#{goodId},#{goodColor},#{goodSize}, #{goodNums},#{goodTotalPrice},NOW(),NOW(),1);
